headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  CAMPBELL, WILLIAM REASON

lead_paragraph: CAMPBELL--William Reason, 85, of Brewster, NY died Sunday, March 30, 2014. Born in Wauseon, OH, son of Leila (Rockwood) and Reasin (Solomon) Campbell. He was a graduate of Harvard University and the author of the memoir: "Dead Man Walking, Teaching in a Maximum Security Prison" He is survived by his daughter: Sarah, his son: Morgan, his grandson: Ryan and his niece: Cynthia Shaughnessy. The family will receive friends on Tuesday, April 1 from 6:00 to 9:00pm at Clark Associates Funeral Home, 4 Woods Bridge Road, Katonah, NY. The funeral service will be held 11am on Wednesday, April 2 also at the funeral home. Burial will follow at Ivandell Cemetery, Somers.
